label: Instructions
description:
# Model Component Documentation

This template documents individual components of your climate model as required for CMIP7 participation.

<details>
<summary>Completion Guidance</summary>

Each component description enables traceability across different models, supports scientific evaluation, and is mandatory for publishing model data to ESGF. The information you provide helps the climate modeling community understand your component's scientific basis, track how components are shared between institutions, and ensure proper attribution in research studies.

</details>

label: Component
description:
Select the process that this model component simulates.

<details>
<summary>Completion Guidance</summary>

MANDATORY field from Model component process CV.

If your component type is not listed, you can register a new entry at: https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/tree/main/realm

</details>

label: Name
description: The name of the model component. MANDATORY field.

label: Family
description: The name of the family of models that the model component belongs to. MANDATORY field.

label: Description
description: A scientific overview of the model component. MANDATORY field.
placeholder: Provide a scientific overview summarizing key processes simulated, scientific basis, and MIP-relevant details.

label: References
description: ## References\n\nMANDATORY: Each reference must include both Citation and DOI properties.

label: Reference 1 - Citation
description: Human-readable citation for the primary component reference. MANDATORY field.

label: Reference 1 - DOI
description: The persistent identifier (DOI) for the primary component reference. MANDATORY field.

label: Code Base
description: A URL (preferably DOI) for the source code. MANDATORY field. Set to 'private' if not publicly available.

label: Embedded In
description:
Select all that apply.

<details>
<summary>Completion Guidance</summary>

Select the model component(s) in which this component is embedded.

OPTIONAL field from Model component process CV.

If your component type is not listed, you can register a new entry at: https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/tree/main/realm

</details>

label: Coupled With
description:
Select all that apply.

<details>
<summary>Completion Guidance</summary>

Select the model component(s) to which this component is coupled.

OPTIONAL field from Model component process CV.

If your component type is not listed, you can register a new entry at: https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/tree/main/realm

</details>

label: Native Horizontal Grid
description: ## Native Horizontal Grid\n\nMANDATORY compound object describing the component's horizontal grid.

label: Grid
description:
Select the horizontal grid type.

<details>
<summary>Completion Guidance</summary>

MANDATORY field from Native horizontal grid Type CV.

If your grid type is not listed, you can register a new entry at: https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/tree/main/native-horizontal-grid-type

</details>

label: Description (Optional)
description: Free-text description of the horizontal grid. OPTIONAL field.
placeholder: Additional horizontal grid details if needed

label: Grid Mapping
description: The coordinate reference system of the horizontal coordinates. MANDATORY field from Grid Mapping CV.

label: Region
description:
Select the portion of the globe where horizontal grid calculations are performed.

<details>
<summary>Completion Guidance</summary>

MANDATORY field from Region CV.

If your region is not listed, you can register a new entry at: https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/tree/main/native-horizontal-grid-region

</details>

label: Temporal Refinement
description:
Select how the distribution of grid cells varies with time.

<details>
<summary>Completion Guidance</summary>

MANDATORY field from Temporal refinement CV.

If your temporal refinement type is not listed, you can register a new entry at: https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/tree/main/native-horizontal-grid-temporal-refinement

</details>

label: Arrangement
description: Grid arrangement of orthogonal physical quantities. MANDATORY field from Arrangement CV.

label: Resolution X
description: Horizontal resolution in X direction (float). OPTIONAL field.

label: Resolution Y
description: Horizontal resolution in Y direction (float). OPTIONAL field.

label: Horizontal Units
description: Units for resolution_x and resolution_y. OPTIONAL field - Required if resolution_x or resolution_y are set.

label: N Cells
description: Total number of grid cells. MANDATORY integer field.

label: N Sides
description: Number of cell sides (edges) for unstructured grids. OPTIONAL integer field.

label: N Vertices
description: Number of vertices (nodes) for unstructured grids. OPTIONAL integer field.

label: Truncation Method
description: Method for truncating spherical harmonic expansion. OPTIONAL field from Truncation method CV.

label: Truncation Number
description: Truncation number for spectral grids. OPTIONAL integer field.

label: Resolution Range (km)
description: Minimum and maximum resolution in km. MANDATORY field as [float,float]. Format: min, max

label: Mean Resolution (km)
description: Mean resolution in km. MANDATORY float field.

label: Nominal Resolution
description:
Select the nominal resolution characterizing the grid.

<details>
<summary>Completion Guidance</summary>

MANDATORY field from Nominal resolution CV.

If your resolution is not listed, you can register a new entry at: https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/tree/main/resolution

</details>

label: Native Vertical Grid
description: ## Native Vertical Grid\n\nMANDATORY compound object describing the component's vertical grid.

label: Coordinate
description:
Select the coordinate type of the vertical grid.

<details>
<summary>Completion Guidance</summary>

MANDATORY field from Coordinate CV.

If your coordinate type is not listed, you can register a new entry at: https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/tree/main/native-vertical-grid-coordinate

</details>

label: Description (Optional)
description: Free-text description of the vertical grid. OPTIONAL field.
placeholder: Additional vertical grid details if needed

label: N z
description: Number of grid cells in Z direction. OPTIONAL integer field. Must be omitted if n_z_range is set.

label: N z Range
description: Minimum and maximum number of Z grid cells for variable resolution. OPTIONAL field as [integer,integer]. Must be omitted if n_z is set. Format: min, max

label: Bottom Layer Thickness
description: Thickness of bottom model layer. OPTIONAL float field.

label: Top Layer Thickness
description: Thickness of top model layer. OPTIONAL float field.

label: Top of Model
description: Value of upper boundary of top model layer. OPTIONAL float field.

label: Vertical Units
description: Physical units for thickness and boundary values. OPTIONAL field - Required if any thickness/boundary values are set.

label: Issue Type
description: This is pre-set and cannot be changed.

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
